issue.title: [CF 1363] Revenge Warrior Reactiv Ability
issue.body:
Patch 7.1.5 changed the way Revenge works for Warriors.

The ability has new a 3 second cooldown (before haste) and a rage cost of 30.

When a melee hit is parried or dodged the rage cost is removed.

This is indicated by an activation border and a weak aura still head up display.

 

The problem is that the "reactiv ability" icon is activ even if there is no activation border.

Same problem with the condition. The condition triggers even if there is no activation border.


> Posted by CurseForge user G3sch4n | Imported from CurseForge issue #1363 | Raw
